segments.text: I ’ d like to check in please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Can I have the name please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , Are you checking out tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am . That ’ s right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you need a wake up call , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok then , your room is 502 on the fifth floor . Breakfast is served between 6.30 am and 9am . Enjoy your stay .
segments.speaker: S2
